title: CoStar FONT ID needed
content:
Looking to see if anybody knows what font this logo is derived from. Thanks for your help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174306im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/1_4632.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174306/http:/typophile.com/files/1_22.jpg) | 264.62 KB |

 [‹ Please ID this](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174306/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44824 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID font, modern blocks. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174306/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44772 "Go to next forum topic")
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content: Don’t know the name of the original but [Jason Walcott](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174306/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Jason%252BWalcott) has a revival named [Groovin’](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174306/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000076).
